mapper.select:
select supplierId, supp.supplierName, debt, payment, lastDebt, currentDebt
from (select id as supplierId, name as supplierName from t_supplier where status = 1
and name like #{supplierName} ) supp
left join (select sum(payable) as debt, sum(paid) as payment, supplierName from view_payment where str_to_date(month, '%Y-%m') = str_to_date(#{month}, '%Y-%m') group by supplierName) pym on supp.supplierName = pym.supplierName
left join (select sum(payable) - sum(paid) as lastDebt, supplierName from view_payment where str_to_date(month, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{month}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) group by supplierName) lpym on supp.supplierName = lpym.supplierName
left join (select sum(payable) - sum(paid) as currentDebt, supplierName from view_payment where str_to_date(month, '%Y-%m') <= now() group by supplierName) cpym on supp.supplierName = cpym.supplierName order by ${orderBy} ${order} limit #{pageOffset},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from t_supplier where status = 1
and name like #{supplierName}
